cast.overview: A headstrong Chinese-American woman returns to China when her beloved grandmother is given a terminal diagnosis. Billi struggles with her family's decision to keep grandma in the dark about her own illness as they all stage an impromptu wedding to see grandma one last time.
cast.title: The Farewell

details.biography: Ines began studying acting while at school at Northwestern University and at that time booked commercial and modelling roles. That lead to Boston, New York, and now in Asia working with some of the best actors and directors. Just last month, she enjoyed two powerful mother roles in Vertical Dramas both shot in China, a new genre which she loved. Now based between Los Angeles and Hong Kong, fluent in Mandarin, Ines works locally and internationally in film, commercial, and TV.
details.name: Ines Laimins
